features.text:
Welcome!

This is Reva's personal gallery.

Reva is an algorithmic/generative artist based in China. She has been in NFT Art/Crypto Art community as an enthusiast since March 2020. In August 2020, she got accepted by Makersplace. Since then she began her journey of NFT.

Reva has worked as an algorithm engineer in the movie-making industry, VR/AR/MR, with a background in computer graphics. Now she is a full-time crypto artist, exploring topics of algorithm art, fractal art, creative programming, real-time interactive installation, and GPU shader programming.

Artworks exhibited here are mainly from Reva's Makersplace and Foundation store. Most of them are videos with BGM. Enjoy with sound on, please :)
Click on the image to play/stop the video. Sound on please.

Reva is an algorithmic artist, creative programmer, engineer of computer graphics. She likes to use rational tools to express her emotional inner world. These three works represent fractal art and shader-based algorithmic generation art in her recent works.

Reva是算法艺术家，创意程序员，计算机图形工程师。她喜欢使用理性的工具去表达感性的内心世界。这三幅作品分别代表她最近作品中的分形艺术以及基于Shader的算法生成艺术。

Cryptoart Panda is a one-month-long crypto art themed event of China crypto art community. 

The activities are 100% organized by the community, and all required plots, skills, and resources are completely contributed by the community members, truly achieving ART OF THE COMMUNITY, BY THE COMMUNITY, AND FOR THE COMMUNITY. 
The current activities include artwork exhibitions, music parties, and NFT collective creation and artwork competitions. 

Cryptoart Panda is becoming the most active force in the China crypto art community.

Cryptoart Panda是为期一个月的中国加密艺术主题系列活动。

活动百分之百由社区组织，所需要的地块、专业技能和资源都完全由社区成员自发贡献，真正做到ART OF THE COMMUNITY，BY THE COMMUNITY, AND FOR THE COMMUNITY。
目前活动内容包括加密艺术展览、音乐节、Panda 主题NFT作品集体创作、加密艺术品评选等。

Cryptoart Panda正在成为中国加密艺术社区最活跃的力量。

The 1979 series is one of the most popular pieces of Kefan404's personal works. "Impermanence", is inspired by the deconstruction of the deity "Black and White Impermanence" depicted in Chinese Taoist mythology.

1979大G系列是Kefan404
个人作品中流传度最广的
一个系列。作品《无常》
灵感源于对中国道教神话
中描绘的神祇“黑白无常”
的解构。

Dogecoin is indeed a social experiment of large scale that will be remembered in the history of crypto and will be talked about over and over. This work contains some of Kefan404's observations on the cryptocurrency investment mania in May 2021.


狗狗币是一场极富话题性的
社会实验。《狗狗币突破
1000美元》这副作品包含
了Kefan404对于加密货币
投资狂热的一些观察。

"Does it come in pink?"  explores the theme of color stereotypes and gender identity. In this artwork, Kefan404 chose Batman, a ‘manly’ comic character to portray a parallel world of pink heroes. 


《习武救不了哥谭市》探讨
的主题有关颜色的刻板印象
与性别偏见。这个作品里，
Kefan404选取了蝙蝠侠这
个经典的“硬汉形象”形象
来讲述了一个平行世界里粉
色英雄的故事。
Click on the image to play/stop the video. Sound on please.

Yuqian(Uchan) Sun is a computational artist graduated from the Academy of Arts&Design, Tsinghua University, and Goldsmiths, University of London. She's currently a doctoral student at the Royal College of Arts. She's also one of Baidu PaddlePaddle developers experts.
Inspired by conversations between virtual characters in video games, she produces works that steer with curiosity. She creates art projects based on AI chatbots, which focus on the narrative and intimacy in human-AI interaction.

孙羽茜，计算艺术家，毕业于清华美院与伦敦大学金史密斯学院，现为英国皇家艺术学院博士生，百度飞桨开发者技术专家(PPDE)。
她的灵感来自于游戏中与虚拟人(Virtual Besings)的对话：她以这种好奇心为创作动力。作品以AI聊天机器人为中心，专注于AI互动中的叙事和亲密关系。

YFII $120 defense, commemorating YFII's rebirth after being blocked by balancer,etherscan and metamask

Act 1: Facing continuous selling pressure by yVault

Act 2: YFII community be as one, sticking to $120

Act 3: Successfully hold the line of defense during 14 days

Act 4: Proof of YFII's value, no more resistance to da moon $8848

YFII-120保卫战，纪念被balancer,etherscan与
metamask封锁之后，浴火重生 
第一章：面对机枪池与巨鲸的猛烈砸盘 
第二章：YFII社区万众齐心，死守120 
第三章：经过14天的努力，成功守住防线 
第四章：证明YFII的社区价值，价格上涨再无阻力

王健行曾供职于中国人民解放军某部，现常居北京。独立水
墨涂鸦艺术家、数字潮流水墨画家，推广中国传统文化和说
唱文化，作为中国街头文化中文说唱的重要推手，持续活动
在地下音乐圈。
多年部队的经历，让他感知承担责任和奉献精神的弥足可贵，
想籍由水墨涂鸦和潮流艺术跨界融合的数字艺术nft，探索打
通中国传统文化和潮流数字文化的内在关联，通过关注收藏
和透彻理解后波普时期涂鸦水墨的本源之——巴斯奎特的意
象标识和图腾符号，再塑造和再营造一种黄色英雄主义精神。
用嘻哈水墨涂鸦切割和重构画面元素，力争在作品体现个人
经历、精神探索的趣味性、人性的多重理解，借鉴涂鸦手法
和书法水墨的创作方式，探讨个人英雄主义，从宇宙关怀层
面关照人类精神纬度，用水墨作品晕染的数字化方式来传递
万物有灵的墨法之境。通过持续不断的努力，让新一代的中
国年轻人理解对于世界和宇宙，以及人类命运共同体的未来
走向——从虚拟走向nft元宇宙的起源之地，重温源于夏商西
周和古希腊的共同宇宙和谐法则，为水墨的再次编程解码和
解构重组提供一种大胆尝试。水墨涂鸦和文字涂鸦是街头文
化范畴内中文空间画面纬度创造和权利意向，将持续探索nft
涂鸦和水墨艺术完美融合的模范样式。
他的作品在德国成功进行个人展览，被国内外知名藏家们重
点收藏。过去的八年，王健行先生在一条极其独特的创作道
路上摸索前进。他用数字喷绘加丙烯材料或泼或喷，亦或直
接用水墨介质在铝箔和纸片上图绘，然后再用工具进行二度
创作处理。在这些混合材料的绽放、闪亮及沉淀当中，他模
糊了街头涂鸦与水墨艺术的界限，同时又将传统文化和时尚
元素融合到书法与绘画之间。在当代艺术对话之中，这些与
众不同的作品检验着自然与理性法则之间的互动，同时在常
规的美学概念与潮流水墨的边界进行突破。

Born in 1987 in Turpan, Xinjiang, with ancestral home Tangshan, Hebei.
Graduated from the People's Liberation Army in 2012 with a bachelor's degree in equipment support command.
Worked in the Second Military Medical University. 
Now being an independent artist and rap musician in Beijing. 
Being immersed in Chinese traditional culture and the art of Buddhist statues since childhood.
Learn from Wang Jieshan (a National first-class artist who is famous by coke ink painting, also reward CHEVALIER DES ARTS ORIENTAUX).
Specializes in the creating landscapes and figures by coke ink painting. 
An important promoter of Chinese street rap culture with participating in underground music activities persistently.
亚洲美洲卡通文明的交织影响
团结起来争取更大胜利
